description:
Jakurai goes to Nagoya to look for clues about TBH and runs into Hifumi and Doppo. Hifumi is working at the Nagoya branch of the host club. When they hear that club patrons have info on TBH, Jakurai, Ichiro, Kuko, and the others go help out at the club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As Soon as You Trust Yourself, You Will Know How to Live.
As Soon as You Trust Yourself, You Will Know How to Live.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
